import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Axios from 'axios'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faUpload } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' function AddAlbum() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState( { artist: '', title: '', genre: '', recordLabel: '', releaseDate: '', description: '', rating: '', coverImage: '' } ); const handleChange = event => { setFormData( { ...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value } ); console.log(formData); }; const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); // Do something with the form data, such as sending it to an API console.log(formData); }; return ( <>
